text: kani, evaraite visvasinci satkaryalu cestaro, variki ayana vari pratiphalanni purtiga prasadistadu mariyu tana anugrahanto marinta adhikanga istadu. Ika ayananu nirakarinci, garvam vahincevariki badhakaramaina siksa vidhistadu; mariyu varu tama koraku - allah tappa itara raksince vadini gani, sahayapade vadini gani pondaleru
